Defines

#define Enable_internal_vref()   (ADMUX |= ((1<<REFS1)|(1<<REFS0)) )
#define Enable_external_vref()   (ADMUX &= ~((1<<REFS1)|(1<<REFS0)) )
#define Enable_vcc_vref()
